about_the_game:
An unique ARPG Survival mix about scouting an escape path for a cursed carriage fleeing deep into the forgotten wildlands.
An injured soldier, a chanter, a mechanic and a mysterious person in the cursed carriage is all what's left from the squad. Every one of you has a tarot card you cannot throw out.
Ahead of you lie thousands of miles of dark forests filled with beasts ready to devour your group at night. Behind you, an enemy army pursuing you.

Surviving is the only option.



Shoot from afar, dash away, jump over enemies, strike, evade,
dance with powerful and unforgiving foes with intuitive,
easy to learn yet hard to master bow wielding techniques.


Four intriguing characters are travelling with you.
Each has their own inner conflict and a motivation to venture forth.
Forge friendships or deepen romances with them to get unique endings.


Your cargo is your only chance to end the war, but it is also instrumental
in your enemies' plan to unleash chthonic evil. Gather resources to strengthen the
seals, repair the carriage and gather provision to continue your journey.


You can also spend these resources on gearing up to fight off the forces
that aim to crush your group. Use sapper tactics, strike and push back enemies
lest they overtake you.

short_description: A unique ARPG Survival mix about scouting an escape path for a cursed carriage fleeing deep into the forgotten wildlands. Explore the woods, find resources that will keep you alive. Develop relationships with the remainder of the squad and survive the suicide mission.
